name: ecowisely
description: EcoWisely - AI-powered carbon footprint tracker and sustainability assistant

scripts.preflight: cd BackEnd && python3 preflight_check.py && cd ../FrontEnd && node preflight-check.js
scripts.preflight:verbose: cd BackEnd && python3 preflight_check.py --verbose && cd ../FrontEnd && node preflight-check.js --verbose
scripts.preflight:skip-apis: cd BackEnd && python3 preflight_check.py --skip-apis && cd ../FrontEnd && node preflight-check.js --skip-backend
scripts.dev:backend: cd BackEnd && source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null; uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd BackEnd && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.train:model: cd BackEnd && source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null; python3 train_model.py
scripts.generate:data: cd BackEnd && source venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null; python3 generate_data.py

author: EcoWisely Team
